tool.name: OpenSwathDIAPreScoring
tool.description: Scoring spectra using the DIA scores.

param.name: swath_files
param.label: Swath files that were used to extract the transitions
param.help: If present, SWATH specific scoring will be applied select mzml data sets(s)

param.name: min_upper_edge_dist
param.label: Minimal distance to the edge to still consider a precursor, in Thomson (only in SWATH)

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Scoring spectra using the DIA scores.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.6.0/html/UTILS_OpenSwathDIAPreScoring.html
